scripts.dev: pnpm templs hello && pnpm run start-template
scripts.dev:docker: pnpm run localnode:docker && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm templs faucet --network localnet && pnpm templs publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && next
scripts.start-template: pnpm run localnode && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm templs faucet --network localnet && pnpm templs publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && next
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: pnpm templs publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: pnpm templs publish --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: pnpm templs publish --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: pnpm templs publish --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: pnpm templs upgrade --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
